title: The Psychology of the Fyre Festival
description:
Dr. Kirk Honda and Humberto talk about the Fyre Festival disaster and the psychology of its organizer, Billy McFarland. Is he a psychopath? Is he a victim of capitalism? Were we all subject to a mass delusion?

The Psychology In Seattle Podcast.

Feb 6, 2019.

Email: Contact@PsychologyInSeattle.com

Access archive at: https://psychologyinseattle.squarespace.com

Become a patron of our podcast by going to https://www.patreon.com/PsychologyInSeattle

Music by Bread Knife Incident.
